mdRecord.dcterms:title: George D. Godard eating lunch, Pole Road School
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Davis, Jackson, 1882-1947
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Full view, A man sits at a table in a classroom. Behind him are visible a woman' s handbag, hat and coat, hung on the wall. There is also a map of the Western Hemisphere. The schedule of subjects to be taught is written on the blackboard.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The Jackson Davis Collection of African American Photographs
Papers and photographs of Jackson Davis [manuscript] 1906-1947 and n.d.
